title: Hydroponics 101: What we grow | CropKing Inc.

tasks.task: Visit the Experimental Greenhouse at Crop King in Lodi, Ohio
subtasks: Learn about nutrient film technique (NFT) system for lettuce growth
Discuss lettuce from seed to harvest (approximately six weeks)
Explore hydroponic tomato cultivation in the tomato house
Note the use of twine to support tomato vines
Observe other hydroponically grown crops (melons, cucumbers)
Understand Beto bucket system for vine crop cultivation
Compare Beto bucket system to NFT system for leafy greens
Discuss natural pollination methods (bumblebees, Veggie Bee)
